DataListSpec.Name: Child Customizations Pages and Tasks Package Version Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Used to display the version of the package deployment.
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_CHILDEXTENSIONTABLEPAGETASKPACKAGEVERSION as begin select 'Version #VersionNumber#' as version end

OutputField.Caption: Child Customizations Pages and Tasks Package
